title: Implement an AI Document Summarizer
roi_reason: Saving time and resources in document review, leading to increased productivity and potential revenue gains.
effort_reason: Requires development of a complex machine learning model and integration with existing systems.

title: Cross-Department Collaboration Hub
roi_reason: Improved collaboration, streamlined workflows, and reduced time spent on context switching, leading to increased productivity and innovation.
effort_reason: Requires significant development effort, integration with multiple systems, and potential changes in team behaviors.

title: Smart Employee Onboarding
roi_reason: Reduced time spent on manual onboarding tasks, faster new hire ramp-up, and improved retention rates.
effort_reason: Requires development of an AI assistant and integration with HR systems.

title: Customer Sentiment Dashboard
roi_reason: Improved understanding of customer needs and preferences, leading to targeted marketing efforts and increased customer loyalty.
effort_reason: Requires integration with multiple communication channels and development of a sophisticated machine learning model for sentiment analysis.

title: VR Training Simulations
roi_reason: Reduced risks associated with high-risk procedures, improved employee safety, and potential cost savings from reduced training expenses.
effort_reason: Requires significant development effort, acquisition of VR hardware, and creation of realistic simulations.

title: Predictive Maintenance System
roi_reason: Reduced downtime, increased equipment reliability, and potential cost savings from reduced maintenance expenses.
effort_reason: Requires development of IoT sensors, a predictive model, and integration with existing systems.

title: Contract Analysis Tool
roi_reason: Reduced legal risks, improved compliance, and potential cost savings from reduced legal fees.
effort_reason: Requires development of a sophisticated machine learning model for legal document analysis and integration with existing systems.

title: Carbon Footprint Tracker
roi_reason: Improved environmental performance, potential cost savings from reduced energy consumption, and increased brand reputation.
effort_reason: Requires development of a tracking system and integration with existing systems.

title: Meeting Efficiency Assistant
roi_reason: Improved meeting productivity, reduced time spent on administrative tasks, and increased innovation.
effort_reason: Requires development of a tool that can take notes, assign action items, and follow up after meetings.

title: Internal Knowledge Wiki
roi_reason: Improved knowledge sharing within the company, reduced time spent on finding information, and increased innovation.
effort_reason: Requires development of a searchable database and integration with existing systems.
